segmentation.segment: EXHIBITION OF BUSINESS MACHINES AND EQUIPMENT '70
This list is based on information gathered by the City Tourist Office.
The City Tourist Office is not responsible for any deficiencies or mistakes, nor for any changes made by the organizers after the list has been printed.
We regret to say that this list of Helsinki congresses, meetings and important events is by no means complete.
As full and varied a list as possible is, however, useful to organisers for e.g. the following reasons:
1. It can be used to avoid clashing and overlapping of important events.
June would seem to be over-crowded usually.
We therefore suggest that where possible meetings and congresses be timed for July and August.
Organisers can use this list to work out the functions, etc. which can be fitted into their congress and conference visitors' free-time programmes.
A new list is printed 2 or 3 times a year.
WE CONTINUE TO HOPE THAT YOU WILL INFORM THIS OFFICE OF ALL YOUR FUTURE PLANS
Important notes at the end of list
UNION FORAINE EUROPÉENNE BOARD OF DIRECTORS MEETING
MEETING OF REPRESENTATIVES OF THE GENERAL UNION OF AGRICULTURAL SOCIETIES
THE 50th ANNIVERSARY OF FINNISH INDEPENDENCE - MAIN CEREMONY
Suomen Siviili- ja asevelvollisuusinvalidien Liitto ry
HEATING, PLUMBING AND AIR CONDITIONING FAIR
HELSINKI ASSOCIATION OF HANDICRAFTS AND INDUSTRY CENTENARY
FINNISH ASSOCIATION OF DRUGSTORES EUROPEAN CONGRESS
CONGRESS OF THE INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF MEDICAL LABORATORY TECHNICIANS
